meanings.definition: Having or showing courage or determination.
meanings.sent1: The little mouse was very plucky when facing the big cat.
meanings.sent2: She admired her plucky friend who never gave up.
meanings.sent3: The plucky squirrel bravely faced the challenge of crossing the busy road.
meanings.sent4: The plucky flower pushed through the cracks in the concrete to reach the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The plucky firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the trapped puppy.

meanings.sent1: The plucky in the story never backed down from a challenge.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the plucky of the neighborhood for her fearless deeds.
meanings.sent3: The plucky at the party was the first to try the unusual food.
meanings.sent4: The plucky of the team led them to victory with their determination.
meanings.sent5: Everyone admired the plucky who climbed the mountain despite the storm.
